The '''Court of the Fountain''' was part of the highest level in the citadel of [[Minas Tirith]], near the steps to the [[Tower of Ecthelion]].  This courtyard held the [[White Tree of Gondor]] and was guarded by the [[Guards of the Citadel]].  It was paved with white stones except around a fountain, where a sward of green lay.  The [[Dead Tree|dead White Tree]], seen by [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]] as he hurried after [[Gandalf]], drooped over the fountain.<ref>{{RK|V1}}</ref>

== Portrayal in adaptations ==
[[File:The Lord of the Rings Online - Court of the Fountain.jpg|thumb|left|The Court of the Fountain in ]'[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'']]
'''2015: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:The Court of the Fountain is represented in three different versions of the in-game [[Minas Tirith]]. Prior to the [[Battle of the Pelennor Fields]] it houses the dead White Tree, modeled after Professor Tolkien's favorite tree in the Oxford Botanical Gardens. After King [[Elessar]] finds the new sapling, the old tree is removed and the sapling is planted down during a formal ceremony in which the player participates. During the royal wedding of Elessar and [[Arwen]] on [[Mid-year's Day|Midsummer Day]], the Court is the center of the festivities.
